nodes.text: A Mon Calamari male droid supervisor gave orders to droids working at the Star Tours spaceport, including R2-D7 and I.D.A., a droid that was difficult to motivate.

The Mon Calamari was a puppet created by and performed by Lynette Eklund. He appeared on a video screen in an area of the original Star Tours queue exclusive to the Tokyo Disneyland version of the ride.
